inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addArmorBonus('Shield', 'ArmorClass', 20); effect.getBonuses().addArmorBonus('Tower Shield', 'ArmorClass', 20); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Shield Defense
description: You gain an additional 20% to Defense from Shields and Tower Shields.
